description.value:
Trigger Mogaru applies any amount of force to the structure

Effect The building trembles. The floors of the building and the streets within 30 feet of the building become difficult terrain; creatures on this difficult terrain take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls, AC, and skill checks. The hazard rolls initiative.

stealth.details: +20 (master) to notice cracks forming in the walls of the structure as Mogaru approaches

details.description: Mogaru brushes against a structure, severely compromising the building's stability and possibly causing it to collapse.
details.disable: @Check[type:athletics|dc:43|name:Brace the Structure] (master), @Check[type:crafting|dc:43|name:Brace the Structure] (master), or @Check[type:engineering-lore|dc:43|name:Brace the Structure]{Engineering Lore} (master) to brace the structure to reduce the risk of collapse until the end of the creature's next turn. The DC of the flat check for this round (see Routine) is increased by 4 on a success, or by 8 on a critical success. Increasing the flat check DC to 21 or higher stabilizes the structure, ending this hazard.
details.reset: The building becomes susceptible to Shake Apart again [[/r 1d6]]{1d6 rounds} after it is stabilized.
details.routine: (1 action) The GM rolls a @Check[type:flat|dc:9] to determine if the building collapses, increasing the DC as listed above. On a successful check, dust and debris fall within the building and 30 feet around it, providing concealment and dealing [[/r 6d6[bludgeoning]]] damage to [[/r 12d6[bludgeoning]]] damage to [[/r 2d4]] randomly chosen targets instead (@Check[type:reflex|dc:35|basic:true] save; on a critically failed Reflex save, the creature is restrained by rubble until freed [Force Open DC 38, Escape DC 35]).
